post.html:
Welcome!

Much excite!
















NOTE TO THE COURSE WATCHERS

I am writing this to you because there is going to be some things you need to know. First off, i move pretty fast so the complete code is available at Here.

BEFORE YOU READ THE CODE

A very important note about the code. It does contain the surprise at the end of the course that will help you understand rust's borrow checker. So I would be careful just rushing in and checking out the code. As there will be a slight difference in the code online due to a last minute refactoring.
















So why 3 languages

The chance is that you want to learn rust or go and simple language tutorials just don't cut it for you.
















There are going to be questions

I will provide stopping points, fequently, along the way.
















Whoami

name: ThePrimeagen

Its not that odd of a name if you know the back story.
















twitch youtube
















Work at a small dvd shipping company. I think we will revolutionize the industry.
















The Pace

We have a couple days. There is a lot of programming to do. So its going to be fast. Really fast. And if you want to move as fast as I do, you can always check out these courses.


Vim Fundamentals


Dev Productivity
















I hope you are excited

And ready to rock
















Google is your friend, sometimes

One more tip. If I forget something today and have to google, you will see me try a few times first without googling. Why?
post.title: TS, Go, And Rust
